name: Reservation Management
description: This theme encompasses features related to managing customer reservations, including booking, modifying, and canceling reservations through a user-friendly interface.

name: Table Assignment
description: This theme focuses on the efficient allocation and management of tables within the restaurant, ensuring optimal seating arrangements and minimizing wait times.

name: Menu Customization
description: This theme allows restaurant owners to create, modify, and manage their menus, including adding new items, adjusting prices, and highlighting specials.

name: Online Ordering
description: This theme covers the functionality for customers to place orders online, including selecting items, customizing orders, and processing payments.

name: Staff Scheduling
description: This theme involves managing staff shifts, including scheduling, tracking hours, and ensuring adequate coverage during peak times.

name: Customer Interface
description: This theme provides a basic interface for customers to book tables and track their orders, enhancing the overall dining experience.
